SCP-8591
 — 
Alex Thorley Doesn't Get Away With It








▸ More by this Author ◂








{$comments2}






 


F.A.Q.






{$doesthisfixthebug}












Item #:
 SCP-8591


Object Class:
 Anomalous


Special Containment Procedures:
 N/A






SCP-8591.






Description:
 SCP-8591 was an adult African Elephant that sporadically appeared and disappeared in Researcher Alex Thorley’s office.


After the publishing of this documentation, SCP-8591 vanished and has not reappeared in over a year.




TRANSCRIPT




Thorley:
 
(On the phone)
 It’s here again.


[…]


Thorley:
 Maybe it’ll go away.


[…]


Thorley:
 I didn't do 
anything.


[…]


Thorley:
 I didn't do anything wrong.


[…]


Thorley:
 Fine.


(Thorley enters their office. There’s an elephant inside.)


Thorley:
 …I’m addressing you.




Rsr. Thorley has been appropriately reprimanded for their undisclosed misconduct prior to this interaction.
